issue.title: Cloudsim simulation runs much longer than battery life if stop service is not called

content.raw: Up to last week my Urban Circuit \(worlds 1-8\) simulations were running for just over 1 hour of simulation time, but over the past week \(along with the other simulator issues\) that increased a ton for me too. Not sure if that might be related to the other issues that were going on. Some ran again today and it looks like they’re back to 1 hour though, so maybe that is resolved now?
content.html: Up to last week my Urban Circuit (worlds 1-8) simulations were running for just over 1 hour of simulation time, but over the past week (along with the other simulator issues) that increased a ton for me too.
